query.(optional) limit: (int) number of place expected to be returned
query.(optional) offset: (int) first index of place expected to be returned

query.origin: (string) origin place to begin route searching
query.dest: (string) destination place to end route searching

query.(optional) name: (string) keyword of name to search for tour guide name
query.(optional) city: (string/array of string) keyword of city/cities to search for tour guide city/cities
query.(optional) limit: (int) number of tour guide expected to be returned
query.(optional) offset: (int) first index of tour guide expected to be returned
